name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy mobile phone from whatsapp message

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically copies the mobile phone number from a whatsapp message to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a phone icon near authors or profiles, and enables the user to see the phone number in digits only format and then copy it.
This extension sends the user to the profile screen on Whatsapp, and returned her/him/them after one second.



Right now we support Israeli phone number copying  in a local format (without country code

Source code can be found here
https://github.com/ranwahle/whatsapp-copy-phone
